name: Sokha
description: Sokha is a very experienced tour guide with a deep knowledge of the history of the Angkor temples. He is fluent in English and French.

name: Vannak
description: Vannak is a young and energetic tour guide who is passionate about sharing the culture of Cambodia with visitors. He is fluent in English and Japanese.

name: Srey
description: Srey is a friendly and knowledgeable tour guide who is great with families. She is fluent in English and Chinese.
